thread.section_title: Ships-a-Lot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ships-a-Lot | www.ships-a-lot.com
thread.title: Steve

author: Steve
title: Steve
text:
This is the first time working with Zach and Max from Ships-a-Lot and the experience couldn't have been any better. The customer service was great with any questions I had being answered within a few hours, even on weekends when a majority of the orders come in.
Shipping and fulfillment has always been an ongoing struggle for us and the Ships-a-Lot team finally made the constant struggle go away. I can trust these guys and look forward to working with them in the future.
